wikitext.*:
<noinclude> </noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgToggle) || !$wgToggle}--><!--{assign var="wgToggle" value=true scope="global"}--><script>
window.RLQ = window.RLQ || [];
window.RLQ.push(function(){
    mw.loader.implement("widgetToggle", function($, jQuery){
        $(window).on('load', function() {
            $('.mw-customtoggle > a > img').on('click', function(){
                $(this).closest('a').click();
                return false;
            });
        });
    });
});</script><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
